Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 106th/Buffalo
ShortDescription: NB 26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, Ave. L, and 106th due to, street blockage near 106th/Buffalo.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, Ave. L, and 106th due to, street blockage near 106th/Buffalo.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Western-FP. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Western (Forest Park Branch).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
